name: Paper Golem Swarm
description: A swarm of animated paper constructs, indistinguishable from ordinary sheets of paper when motionless. They move quickly and can fill spaces, engaging in swarm tactics and using paper-based attacks.
memorable: Can confuse and damage foes with swarm tactics and abilities like Ink Blot.
goals: Primarily serve as unique enemies in encounters, utilizing stealth and swarm tactics.
relations: Related to other constructs, potentially created by a wizard or artificer.
environment: Typically found in libraries, study rooms, or locations involving knowledge or magic.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for evasion of attacks and quick strikes; immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, making it susceptible to specific magical attacks.
attacks: Uses Paper Cut for slashing damage and Whirlwind to damage nearby enemies with chaotic movement.
most_powerful_ability: Ink Blot, which applies poison damage after a successful hit with an attack.
senses: Passive perception is low at 8, indicating limited insight.
additional_information: False Appearance enables stealth by mimicking ordinary paper.
Immutable Form prevents alteration from spells.
Magic Weapons feature allows bypassing of damage resistances.
Swarm ability lets it occupy the same space as other creatures.
test_queries: chaotic creature that can fly and confuse
unique enemy made of paper with ink attacks
stealthy swarm that doesn't regain hit points
paper golem that inflicts poison damage
